div1.p: United States of America, Plaintiff. vs Harry Smith, Defendant. No. 3376 HEARING

How on this day this cause comes on for hearing on return to writ of Habeas Corpus. J. J. Sullivan appearing for the petitioner and Clay Allen appearing for the Government. whereupon the cause is argued by respective counsel. The Government has until July 6th to file brief. The cause is taken underadvisement.
